A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Attention\, reviews are full of fanboys and Disney employees!  Story falls apart\, nothing to hold on\, there is no lore\, character development or anything to hold on. Overall movie is below average at best! This is a step back even from the last SW ep 8 movie\, that was not even top notch as well! Do not go to cinema\, wait for a release if you are a fan\, not worth it at all
